page.title: 10THE LIDO-LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: There is quite a lot to do at the Lido beach.You could play football on the grassy areas or if you are between 14_20 years old,you could go to the disco in the cafe.Down by the sea you could play on the sandy beach or go wind_surfing and water_skiing.You could hire a yacht from the boating area.There is also an arcade inside the cafe.Each Bonfire night there is a display of fireworks and refreshments are provided. The main attraction of the year is Scottish Week.The Lido is busy ever night with displays, entertainment, fairs and kipper tents.
